title: 少年風水師
author: 妖九拐六
description: 內容簡介：這個世界上，有很多事情是你我沒有遇見過的。我們沒有遇見過的事情，並不代表着它不存在。傳說，很多時候不僅僅只是傳說。而傳統，之所以能成爲傳統，就一定有着不爲人知的理由。...
description_translated: Synopsis: There are many things in this world that you and I have never encountered. The fact that we haven't encountered something doesn't mean it doesn't exist. Legends, many times, are more than just legends. And traditions, if they can become traditions, must have unknown reasons...
